alert.note: Alert for Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 5:00AM CDT until May 24 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Central Tillman County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northern Wilbarger County in northern Texas... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 500 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Tipton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Frederick, Tipton, Manitou, Hollister, Humphreys and Hess. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
